condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2017 Proportion of 0-23 month children (both girls and boys) optimally fed increased to 70 percent through integrated IYCF and care promotion.

description.narrative: Exclusive Breastfeeding rate increased from 15 per cent to 24 per cent during the programme cycle. In the same period, UNICEF supported the government to develop and National strategic plans on Maternal Infant and Young Child Nutrition, and Social and Behaviour Change Communication. The IYCF programme reached 1,224,686 caregivers. | Status:Met | As-of Date:13/01/2018
